DOC.brief_summary: The goal study get information current smoker feel towards electronic cigarette ( e-cigarette ) nicotine oral inhaler . This include belief , harm , appeal , ease use , enjoyment , use help people stop smoking .
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects see Baseline , 3-days post-baseline , 9 day post-baseline post product use questionnaires carbon monoxide monitoring . The time frame follow 6 month post Baseline visit .
DOC.criteria: Subjects smokers 18 year old , previous experience either ecigarette nicotine oral inhaler , recruit local community . They currently smoke amount frequency level motivation stop smoking . Exclusion criterion include recent ( within 2 week ) myocardial infarction angina , poorly control asthma/chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , active substance abuse , pregnancy , current use cessation medication
